name: Hunt them all!
description:
• One day this little guy decided to kill all the birds and their leader. Can YOU hunt them all? and beat their leader? Try this game and you will see.
  • Controls: 
  • Movement: WSAD
  • Shooting: ArrowKeys
  • Use Item: [Space] or [E]
  • Used software: Unity, Aseprite, BFXR and Audacity
  • Have fun!
